sentences.en: Anyway, a man would starve while he waited.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么着, 不能等着挨饿.

sentences.en: He said the only alternative was to starve the people, and he said this could not be allowed to happen.
sentences.cn: 他说唯一的其他选择就是让人们挨饿，又说这是绝对不允许发生的。
我会在岸上挨饿要饭的.

sentences.en: It's a hard thing to skulk and starve in the heather.
sentences.cn: 躲在树林里的挨饿不是一件好受的事.

sentences.en: The army intends to take the city or simply starve it into submission.
sentences.cn: 军队打算占领该城市或干脆截断其粮食补给迫使其投降。

sentences.en: They decided to starve the enemy out.
sentences.cn: 他们决定使敌人受饿而出来.

sentences.en: They starve for the experience of practical work.
sentences.cn: 他们迫切需要实际工作的经验.

sentences.en: They tried to starve the army into surrender.
sentences.cn: 他们试图使守军因饥饿而投降.

sentences.en: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.cn: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

sentences.en: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.cn: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.en: What do you keep her at home for? You want to starve her to death ?'
sentences.cn: 还养在家里做什么 呢? ’

sentences.en: When the breadwinner is ill, his children will do anything rather than starve.
sentences.cn: 大人病了, 儿女们做贼做娼也比饿着强!

sentences.en: You can't see people starve without trying to help them, can you?
sentences.cn: 你不会坐视人们挨饿而不想办法去帮助他们 吧 ?

sentences.en: You can't see your sister starve without trying to help her!
sentences.cn: 你不能让你姐姐挨饿而不想法去帮助她!

sentences.en: You have built up a huge property empire by buying from wretched people who had to sell or starve.
sentences.cn: 你靠从那些不卖房就得挨饿的可怜人手里买下房子后建立起了庞大的房产帝国。

words.tran_cn: 挨饿的，饥饿的；饿瘦了的；贫穷的

trans.tran_en: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat

trans.tran_cn: 挨饿，[非正式用语] 饥饿，受饿，[古语] 冻死
trans.tran_en: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat
